awd_titl_txt: Research Engineering Equipment:  Dual Camera System for the Measurement of Unsteady Flow Phenomena
awd_abstract_narration: Funded under an Engineering Research Equipment Grant,                           equipment will be purchased to support a variety of projects                    involving the development application of advanced flow field                    diagnostics.  The equipment consists of cameras and motion                      analysis equipment, and will be utilized in conjunction with                    recently developed techniques for embedding marked tracers in                   rapidly varying flows.                                                                                                                                          The flows of interest range from low speed to supersonic, and                   the novel diagnostics will help resolve details necessary for                   the eventual development of improved modeling and predictive                    tools for a variety of engineering flow systems.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
